section.name: Metro Constructor Parameters
section.p: The Metro container extwnds the generic part plugin instantiation model with support for constructor parameter types supporting logging channel assignment, provison of context data, and initialization of intermal parts.

tr.td: Introduction to the semantics concerning the usage of a Logger as a common constructor argument.

Introduction to #Context inner interface wherein a component implemention declares the interface of the context object that to be supplied by the runtime container. In effect, the component Context interface is the declaration by a component of it's functional dependencies with the outside world.

Introducing component composition through encapsulation of and management of a collection of internal parts that are strongly aggregated to (considered as a part of) the enclosing component instance (i.e. destruction of the component implies destruction of all internal parts).
